website_summaries.verdict: An effective oil brand that can be taken by the tablespoonful.
pros: Works well to season cast iron
In this form it can be used in uncooked foods like salad dressing or smoothies
Good flavor compared to other brands
cons: Watch the quality or expiration on this oil
It can go bad or stale after opening

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for re seasoning cast iron
customer_reviews.text: I used this to re-season my cast iron pans, and it worked GREAT. Even after just one use I could see how well it was working. The attached image is the stripped pan, one coat, and then after the 5th coat. I did six coats in total but from 5th to 6th it didn't look incredibly different. VERY happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JeniQ

customer_reviews.title: Bitter, Now I'm Bitter As Well
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one sent to me, and it's bitter and rancid as well. Update: I bought the exact same brand from a local healthfood store refrigerated and it tasted great! Not bitter at all! There is a bad batch at Amazon or their handling of it is making it go bad. DO NOT EAT BITTER TASTING FLAX OIL!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Provides nutrients and moisture for hair and skin
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes horrible BUT the wonders and benefits of this more than makes up for it. Ever since taking it, 1 tablespoon a day, I noticed my scalp psoriasis around my hairline has cleared up. I used to not be able to go 2 days without having to douse the area in hair oil to mask the dry patches, now the dry patches no longer exist!!!! My hair also seems to exude moisture from WITHIN. So happy I added this to my beauty regimen
customer_reviews.author: JayGD3

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏽💖👍🏽 Still the best on the market 🥇
customer_reviews.text: Still is the highest quality oil out there. I’ve tried them all and really used to love Udo’s and Barleens flavored options but xylitol kills beneficial gut flora/probiotics😢😔 This, Barleen’s organic, high lignan, cold pressed, flax oil is still the purest option out there and doesn’t cause reactions in my body or my children’s body like cheaper versions do.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: It’s real and effective!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil, it taste right and the benefits are amazing....You should pour it in a glass bottle and keep it in the fridge...your joints will stay in great shape, body pains will decrease and flee...eyes will work better, good for heart and so much more...look up the benefits of this oil , u will be amazed..This company has been around for a long time and is very reputable, however I must say that it’s pass time for them to stop using plastic bottles...we love the flax oil and will even pay a little more for glass bottles so how about it owners of this good company...please make the switch to glass bottles!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ALN

customer_reviews.title: Fine, but do not use to season pots and pans. Unfiltered, leaves gritty residue behind.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to season my cast iron and carbon steel pans. Kinda a mistake. Did not take into account that this oil is not filtered. My mistake, left a rough surface on my pans. My mistake. Had to order another brand of flaxseed oil today. Appears to be as described. I personally do not ingest this stuff or cook with it.
customer_reviews.author: Averagejoe

customer_reviews.title: Barleans's Organic Flax Oil is great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product must be kept refrigerated. Just make sure that this product is kept very cold & it has a date of "Freshest Before" of 6 months. When I purchased it online, I didn't have but a few months left for "freshness", so I used it as much as possible so it wouldn't go bad. It's a quality product, the plastic bottle felt cool to the touch, and I will purchase this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Born

customer_reviews.title: would not reorder this product again nor recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived rancid , poured out very dark , almost black. Tasted nasty! Pour quality control, would not reorder this product again nor recommend. It
customer_reviews.author: DAN STEMPER

customer_reviews.title: Great product - bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: Great product - bad packaging. The oil is recommended to be refrigerated after opening. The plastic bottle becomes so hard that I have to squeeze it with two hands to get some oil out. This is not the most convenient thing to do, considering that the oil needs to be poured into a measuring spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Great for my health!
customer_reviews.text: I mix a tablespoon in my juice every morning! This organic flax oil is pure and unfiltered and supplies my body with omega-3, omega-6, and omega 9! It is the best brand!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Olsen

customer_reviews.title: First time buying
customer_reviews.text: I have never bought flaxseed oil. We keep ground flax in the frig for smoothies and oatmeal so I decided to try the oil. There is something about the bottle that is uncomfortable in your hand. It is hard plastic and so hard to squeeze the oil out. A glass jar or bottle would be better for me
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Expiring soon:-(
customer_reviews.text: The oil was produced last year, and expires in 1 month. It smells old :-(
customer_reviews.author: Z.B.

customer_reviews.title: These 2 bottles-oil bad - spoiled
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering this same product for years with out any problems. These 2 bottles (date Oct 2019--Oct 2020) came & have been refrigerated. When I tried to add to protein shake, could not drink as terrible taste. Tried small amount on tongue & again taste is strong & not the normal/usual taste. Curious if anyone has had problems with this particular batch. Evidently, can not return. Will buy from local health food store. Just noticed another comment said same thing, product is bitter bad taste from Scott. Can I get a refund or new replacement?
customer_reviews.author: FF from FL

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled and rancid
customer_reviews.text: Beware! I received my bottle of Flax oil with an expiration date of March 2021. Great, right? Not really. The oil came out of the bottle in a dark grey color, almost black and tasted weird. I have been using flax oil for decades. Fresh flax oil has a light yellow translucent color and a mild taste. This oil looks like something I see when I get an oil change for my car - no kidding. I have used this company before and the oil was fine. Not sure if Amazon has been handling it incorrectly? My return time has expired. Waste of money! I will switch to another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: ron field

customer_reviews.title: Quality Flax Oil
customer_reviews.text: This flax oil is much better quality than others I have tried. It has a light nutty flavor that is fresh and not rancid. It seems to help my joint pain enough to take the edge off. Barlean's is a trustworthy company.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Bee

customer_reviews.title: Works well on bruises.
customer_reviews.text: Helping my hubby with his thin, easily bruised skin. Bruises heal much faster now.
customer_reviews.author: Eyes wide openTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste but I can see how others wouldn’t. It’s nutty. The liquid is rich, Golden, thick and adds excellent flavor. Upon the recommendation of other reviewers I tried it for seasoning my cast iron pans, with excellent result.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole James

customer_reviews.title: Great for cast-iron seasoning.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to season my cast-iron and I love it. Definitely recommend for that. Haven’t really tasted it but it gives the house a nutty scent as opposed to other oils when seasoning.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible !!! made my stomach upset for 3 days. Had to get a refund. Will not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: timothy a. koverchick

customer_reviews.title: YUCKADOO Bitter
customer_reviews.text: Arg! It is April not hot and this flax oil is brownish gold and BITTER beyond belief... I dont feel confident if it is good or bad.. Amazon refunded me and said chuck it or whatever... Trying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: outtadodge

customer_reviews.title: Great flax seed oil

customer_reviews.text: This flax oil is a favorite. It has the healthy EFA's especially the Omega 3's. It tastes excellent on vegetable dishes, grains, beans, etc. Fortunately, it is reasonably priced at Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: This product will deliver healing and good health
customer_reviews.text: I like the company's brand name because they are a well trusted company with history and a good reputation...

customer_reviews.text: awesome for cast cookware takes a few coats but then there is no sticking and it also helps prevent rust.

customer_reviews.title: No Problems
customer_reviews.text: No problems with freshness. Just like what I buy at the health food store. Of course, it's cool weather right now.
customer_reviews.author: 80s Fan

customer_reviews.title: Cast Iron Seasoning Oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I read that it works great for developing that coveted nonslip surface on cast iron cookware. They were not lying. This oil builds up the seasoning way faster than canola oil. I had treated my cast iron for canola oil for years with little thickness on the seasoning. This oil built up the seasoning it just a few applications.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cast iron
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my cast iron pans. Great value for a great product! Thank you so much.

I now depend on Amazon to supply my Organic Barlean's Flax Oil with Lignans.

customer_reviews.text: This is one of the "lighter" tasting flax seed oils I have had. I was worried when it was delivered sitting in the sun on a 90 degree day but it was completely fine. I'm a bit more then half done with the bottle after a little more then two weeks and the taste is about the same as when I started (I know these tend to "go bad" quickly). Little pricy though...I may look around locally for a better $/oz ratio.

It's good, I like it, and I like the possibility that it is better for my health than other flax oils. With nutrition science being full of quackery as it is, I'm not entirely sure about the health claims associated with lignans... I should do some of my own research.

customer_reviews.title: There are some good articles about why it is so awesome
customer_reviews.text: I use Flax seed oil to season my cast iron periodically. There are some good articles about why it is so awesome. The cast iron cookware comes out a beautiful black, and it lasts a long time. I'm not real anal about the ongoing care of my cast iron, so we'll occasionally use a scratch pad, or some soap, so I have to re-season it every few months. It does make the house stink for a few hours. Anyway, a fine product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product.
customer_reviews.text: My first bottle arrived with a cracked top and broken seal. It took some time, but I got my replacement and it was handled very well by Amazon et al. I am very happy with the product. I use it to season my carbon steel pans and it does well. Dont forget to refrigerate after opening to prevent it from going rancid. On a side note, this product provides a great "feats of strength" challenge if you are inclined to do some shots of it for your daily intake.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting flax oil
customer_reviews.text: I've used flax oil for years now, but usually bought the cheapest or most well-known brand. They all tasted, as my friend described, "like death." We would always drink it like a shot and have to chase it down with something else to erase the after-taste. I finally decided to switch, so I bought this brand based on the highest quantity and quality of reviews, here on Amazon. I regret not making the switch to this product sooner. This flax oil does not taste bad at all, and I would gladly use this in food dishes now.
customer_reviews.author: Thoe99

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for years, it keeps my fingernails healthy and growing, before they would always break.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Flax Oil
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oil because I've been trying to change my diet to be 25% fat, 25% protein and 50% carbs and was having a hard time getting to the fat %. I was surprised at how full I was after eating it in my regular breakfast. It has definitely helped reduce my appetite and after reading about the other benefits on line (reduce joint inflammation, cholesterol, triglicerides, etc), I am hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Alley

product_meta.title: Barlean’s Organic Lignan Flax Oil, 16-oz
product_meta.description: Pure, unfiltered and unrefined. That’s music to our ears at Barlean’s, and our Organic Lignan Flax Oil is all those things and more. With its wholesome, nutty flavor, Barlean’s Lignan Flax Oil provides a whopping 7,230mg of plant-based ALA Omega-3 fatty acid per tablespoon. Omega-3s are vital fatty acids that cannot be produced by the body, so we need to get them from foods or supplements. Barlean’s Organic Lignan Flax Oil is an award-winning unfiltered organic flax oil, freshly pressed in the Pacific Northwest, and protected from damaging heat and light from seed to bottle. It includes nutrient- and antioxidant containing flax lignans, great additions to a healthy diet for the whole family. Pro tip: you’ll want to give the bottle a vigorous shake before using since we’ve left in some of the flax particulate which can settle to the bottom between uses.
feature_bullets: High in ALA Omega-3 fatty acid: 7,230mg per Tbsp
USDA Organic, Non-GMO, Vegan, Gluten Free, Kosher
Fresh, cold-pressed and protected from air and light
Enjoy right off the spoon or mix into salad dressings, yogurt, oatmeal, or smoothies

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
